name: DEDEDE DAGGERS
description:
A homage to the absolutely excellent Devil Daggers by @sorathdev. If you have not already played Devil Daggers, what are you doing playing this?? Go play Devil Daggers. It's an excellent game. 

Inspired bythis tweet from @slmjkdbtl, also known as wengwengweng .

Every asset in this game, including the sounds, were generated from this png. 

Post your high scores in the comments! Mine to beat is: 55 seconds. 

*the sounds are aggressively loud. I recommend playing with low volume*

"sound design is heavy af" - @eugnosis

~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ CONTROLS ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~

W/A/S/D or Arrow Keys - Movement

Mouse - Look

Click and Hold - Steady shot

Quick Click - Cluster shot

~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ 

thanks for dededeing

 crawlspace ~ 2018
